column4: i did a full ubuntu reinstall, installed the official nvidia drivers, lexmark printer, full gstream package, k3b, nerolinux, mplayer, xmms, celestia and grisbi, then went to set up access to my remote ftp server, and all mounted connections give me this http://pastebin.com/507654
did my ftp association get screwed up somewhere laong the way? on all my prveious installs. ftp was nevre a problem
are you trying to connect to another ftp site?
you need to have proftpd or something like that installed
